info.name: KiTechnAPI
info.description:
### ‚ú® A Simple and Clean ‚öôÔ∏è C-R-U-D üìù Application

KiTechnAPI is a simple and clean CRUD application designed to manage recipes efficiently.Built with Node.js, Express, and Mongoose (MongoDB) and It follows the MVC architecture and Uses Postman for API testing and documentation.

request.description:
##### üìò Endpoint: `GET /recipes`

---

##### üìù Description

Retrieves a list of all available recipes from the API. üç≤üìã

---

##### üîó Request

- Method **:** `GET`
    
- URL **:** `https://kitechnapi.onrender.com/recipes`
    

---

##### üí° Example Use Case

- Use this endpoint to fetch and display all recipes on a homepage or recipe listing page in your app. üì±üë®‚Äçüç≥

response.name: All Recipes

request.description:
##### üìò Endpoint: `GET /recipes/:recipeID`

---

##### üìù Description

Fetches a single recipe based on its unique `recipeID`. Useful for viewing detailed information about a specific recipe. üçõüîç

---

##### üîó Request

- Method **:** `GET`
    
- URL Format**:** `https://kitechnapi.onrender.com/recipes/:recipeID`
    
- Example URL**:** `https://kitechnapi.onrender.com/recipes/RCP001`
    

---

##### üì• Parameters

- `:recipeID` (string) ‚Äì The unique identifier of the recipe you want to retrieve.
    

---

##### üí° Example Use Case

- Use this endpoint to fetch single recipe and display all details about recipe on a recipe details page. üì±üë®‚Äçüç≥

response.name: Single Recipe

request.description:
##### üÜï Endpoint: `POST /recipes`

---

##### üìù Description

Creates a new recipe by submitting recipe details to the server. üçΩÔ∏è‚úçÔ∏è

---

##### üîó Request

- Method **:** `POST`
    
- URL **:** `https://kitechnapi.onrender.com/recipes`

- Content-Type: `application/json`
    

---

##### üí° Example Use Case

- Useful for adding new dishes to your recipe database. üì±üë®‚Äçüç≥

response.name: New Recipe

request.description:
##### üîÑ Endpoint: `PUT /recipes/:recipeID`

---

##### üìù Description

Updates an existing recipe using its unique `recipeID`. üîßüçõ

---

##### üîó Request

- Method : `PUT`
    
- URL Format: `https://kitechnapi.onrender.com/recipes/:recipeID`
    
- Example URL: `https://kitechnapi.onrender.com/recipes/RCP002`
    
- Content-Type: `application/json`
    

---

##### üì• Parameters

- `:recipeID` (string) ‚Äì The unique identifier of the recipe you want to retrieve.
    

---

##### üí° Example Use Case

- Useful for editing recipe details like ingredients, instructions, or name. üì±üë®‚Äçüç≥

response.name: Updated Recipe

request.description:
##### üóëÔ∏è Endpoint: `DELETE /recipes/:recipeID`

---

##### üìù Description

Deletes an existing recipe from the database using its unique `recipeID`. ‚ùåüçΩÔ∏è

---

##### üîó Request

- Method: `DELETE`
    
- URL Format: `https://kitechnapi.onrender.com/recipes/:recipeID`
    
- Example URL:`https://kitechnapi.onrender.com/recipes/RCP002`
    

---

##### üì• Parameters

- `:recipeID` (string) ‚Äì The unique identifier of the recipe you want to delete.
    

---

##### üí° Example Use Case

- Useful for removing outdated or incorrect recipes.. üì±üë®‚Äçüç≥

response.name: Deleted Recipe
